Command.Text: penup fd 100 rt 90 fd 100 left 90 pendown

make :number 5 make :order 3 make :x / - * 2 :order :number * :number 2 make :step 10
dotimes [ :k * 360 :number ] [ fd :step rt + :k :x ]
penup left 90 fd 300 right 90 pendown setpc 5
repeat 30 [ repeat 20 [ fd 10 rt 10 ] repeat 10 [ fd 20 rt 100 ] ]
penup rt 180 fd 200 left 90 fd 100 left 90 pendown setpc 7
repeat 18 [ forward 50 right 150 forward 60 right 100 forward 30 right 90 ]
